name: Mission of Survival: Mist Island
description:
Yulian a D Rank Hunter who seek to be stronger follow his uncle path commander sylez but suddenly there the unknow help signal from middle of the sea and master guild gather some D Rank hunter to investigate that signal include Yulian so why there a  signal in middle of the sea??, did Yulian will face dangerous situation???....

Survival  RPG Maker with day/night cycle and crafting system

NOTE: THIS GAME IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT, if there any bug , most of feature are missing, some ambigous english (because i still learn english though) please report or comment i very grateful if you can do that
